45. In settings where skilled birth attendants are available, 
CCT is recommended for vaginal births if the care 
provider and the parturient woman regard a small 
reduction in blood loss and a small reduction in the 
duration of the third stage of labour as important.

Uterine massage 46. Sustained uterine massage is not recommended as an 
intervention to prevent postpartum haemorrhage in 
women who have received prophylactic oxytocin.
Not recommended
